price: 25. Nous avons envoyé Noé à son peuple : « J’ai en charge, leur dit-il, de vous avertir explicitement
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
